index_terms: CHICAGO MILWAUKEE ST. PAUL PACIFIC RAILROAD
summary: An ordinance relating to the franchise granted to the Oregon-Washington Railroad and Navigation Company, the Great Northern Railway Company and the Chicago-Milwaukee and St. Paul Railway Company, by Ordinance 37549, as last amended and extended by Ordinance 84105, and amending Section 2 of said Ordinance 37549 to modify certain franchise rights-of-way.
